Inici de l\'esdeveniment malgrat que va ser activat manualment el seu perfil
La desinstal·lació de PPHelper requereix ROOT
després de durada - perfil per defecte
esdeveniment pausa - activar i desfer perfil

esdeveniment pausa - activar i fets de reiniciar
Si canvies el color de la icona, la icona de la barra d\'estat serà blanca. Si selecciones una altre icona, en la barra d\'estat es veurà una icona d\'aplicació.
Feu clic aquí per mostrar la informació important

Esdeveniment no s'executa quan: 
1. Heu inhabilitat l'execució esdeveniments globals("semàfor vermell") - habilitar-los al menú d'Editor, opció "Permetre executar esdeveniments". 
2. Heu activat manualment el perfil ("semàfor taronja") - cal que re-inicieu els esdeveniments. Utilitza la icona Reprendre esdeveniments des de les opcions Activador, Editor o Notificació. L'activació manual del Perfil està indicat també amb "[M]" davant del nom del perfil. L'Excepció d'això és, quan l'esdeveniment ha marcat la preferència "ignora activació manual". 
3. Heu inhabilitat l'execució de l'esdeveniment en preferències de l'esdeveniment - preferència d'esdeveniment "Permetre executar" ha d'estar marcada. 
Nota: "Semàfor" és al títol de l'Activador i al Editor.
Les preferències del mateix perfil requereixen permisos de ROOT. Aquestes preferències es marquen amb una \"R\".
[#] Començar només quan el perfil estigui activat
Podeu utilitzar els comodins: \"%\" = qualsevol caràcter, \"_\" = qualsevol caràcter.

Si vostè té un dispositiu de Sony i habilitat el modus \"Stamina\" a la opció Administració d\'energia, si us plau afegiu PhoneProfiles a \"Apps active in standby\". Sense això, l\'aplicació no funciona correctament.
Algunes preferències de perfil requereix canvis en la configuració de sistema. Aquestes preferències estan marcats amb \"(S)\".
Permetre PhoneProfiles en Notificacions, permetent la preferència de perfil \"Tipus d\'interrupcions\".
\"Interruptions\" in profile \"Ringer mode\" requires enabling PhoneProfiles in \"Notification access\" system settings. Click here and enable PhoneProfiles.
Allow PhoneProfiles in \"Notification access\" system settings, for enabling Notification parameters.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then profile will be activated.
requires some permissions to be granted.
Installation of tone \"PhoneProfiles Silent\" will not be executed, because this requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then tone will be installed.
Installation of tone \"PhoneProfiles Silent\" requires some permissions to be granted.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then you can select wallpaper from gallery.
Selecting custom profile icon requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then you can select icon from gallery.
Export application data requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then data will be exported.
Import application data requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then data will be imported.
You have not enabled \"Modify system settings\". Never ask again for this?
Please search for \"PhoneProfiles\" application and enable it.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then events will be restarted.
requires some permissions to be granted.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then rescan will be performed.
Get calendar list requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then calendar list will be shown.
Get contacts list requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then contact list will be shown.
Please enable Location and Wi-Fi scanning in System Settings. Without this, Wi-fi scanning will not working.
Please enable Location and Bluetooth scanning in System Settings. Without this, Bluetooth scanning will not working.
Wi-Fi scan in Power Save mode
Bluetooth scan in Power Save mode
In Android 6 (Marshmallow), is not possible to change system setting \"Vibrate when ringing\" in non-rooted device.
In Android 6 (Marshmallow), is not possible to change level of \"Adaptive brightness\" in non-rooted device.
In Android 6 (Marshmallow), for Wi-Fi scanning must be enabled Location and \"Wi-Fi scanning\" in Location settings.
In Android 6 (Marshmallow), for Bluetooth LE scanning must be enabled Location and \"Bluetooth scanning\" in Location settings.
Allow PhoneProfiles detect what application is in the foreground. This is necessary for events with enabled \"Applications parameters\".
Allow PhoneProfiles in \"Accessibility\" system settings, for enabling Applications parameters.
For change adaptive level, ROOT is required.
Profile can be activated in two modes:
1. manual activation - activated in Activator, Editor, notification, widget, shortcut. Manually activated profile is indicated with \"[M]\" in front of the profile name.
Manual activation pauses all events and events will be never started. You must Restart events to resume the events start.
Exceptions to this rule is if the event has set preference \"Ignore manual activation\".
Restart events can be invoked from Activator, Editor and notification.
In title of Activator and Editor is \"traffic light\".
- green color: events can be started.
- orange color: events can not be started - profile is activated manually.
- red color: events are stopped - events run can be enabled with Editor menu item \"Enable events run\".

In Android 6 is implemented \"Doze mode\" and \"App Standby\". When you encountered problems with profile activation from events, if you leaves a device unplugged and stationary for a period of time, with the screen off, add PhoneProfiles into \"Battery\"→\"Battery optimization\"→\"Not optimized\".
In Android 6 this system setting can be changed only on rooted devices. Affected are ringer modes and interruption types with vibration.
The event may be in 5 states:
Running: event is started and running. Event parameters are satisfied.
Paused: event is not running. Event parameters are not satisfied. Event is waiting for parameters satisfaction.
Stopped: event is stopped and can not be started. Event parameter \"Enable run\" is not checked.
Paused with delay: event is started, but is waiting in the delay. Event parameters are satisfied.
When not any event is running, activated is \"Default profile\", when is configured. You can configure default profile in application settings in \"Profile activation\". Click here, to configure it.
If your device has not separated volume for ringer and notifications, keep enabled volumes separation.

How \"volume separation\" works: Profile activation adjust the device volume by profile notifications volume level. When call ringing is detected, ringing volume level from profile is adjusted. After end of call, notification volume level from profile is back adjusted.
Can\'t delete, location is used in any event.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then location change detection will be performed.
Connection to Google Play Services failed. Click here to resolve it.
Setup location parameters in application settings.
Location scan in Power Save mode
Please enable Location in System Settings. Without this, location scanning will not working.
Use GPS when not in Power Save mode
Please grant them in next dialogs.
Running with delay: event is running, but parameters are no longer satisfied. Event is waiting in the delay.
Experimental. It may not work on your device
Allow PhoneProfiles in \"Accessibility\" system settings, for enabling \"Ignore for applications\" parameter.
Setup Wi-fi parameters in application settings.
Setup Bluetooth parameters in application settings.
Orientation scan in Power Save mode
Setup Orientation parameters in application settings.
When option \"24 hours\" not working on your device (LG), use option \"Always On\". Option \"Always On\", may encountered troubles on your device (Samsung). Then use option \"24 hours\".
You have selected ringer/notification tone from sdcard. Tone will not be played, because this requires some permissions.
Please grant them in next dialogs. Then tone will be played.
Playing selected ringer/notification requires some permissions to be granted.
This important info can be viewed In Editor through the question mark icon in the toolbar.
Some profile preferences are interactive. These preferences shows system setup screen. These preferences are marked with \"(I)\".
Note: orange text in this info is clickable. Click to this text opens relevant setup screen.
Event run is not enabled. Enable it?
Please rate this application in Google Play
Application uses languages configured in system.
You have not enabled \"Do not disturb access\". Never ask again for this?
Please search for \"PhoneProfiles\" application and enable it.
Add PhoneProfiles to \"Not optimized\", when you encountered problems with profile activation from events, if you leaves a device unplugged and stationary for a period of time, with the screen off.
Start when is outside mobile cell
Mobile cells scanning requires some permissions.
Setup Mobile cells parameters in application settings.
Mobile cells scan in Power Save mode
All Bluetooth names configured in system
4. Each event has \"Priority\". Event will not be started, if is running event with higher priority.
Events are running in \"Start order\". You can set start order of events in Editor in events view \"Start order\". In this view, you can drag event up/down by \"order handler\".
You can activate profile from Tasker. Configure task \"System\"/\"Send Intent\" with parameters:
You can manage events from Tasker. Configure task \"System\"/\"Send Intent\" with parameters:
You must write tag name into NFC tag. \"Write to NFC Tag\" is in menu for each tag name.
Attach your phone to a NFC tag. Write will be started.
NFC must be enabled. Please enable it and try again.
Pause event after manual profile activation and restart events
Do you find this application useful?\nSupport its development by sending a donation to the developer.
In-App Donations are not supported. Is Google Play Store installed correctly?
Thank you for donating.\nI really appreciate this.
You have not enabled \"Draw over the apps\". Never ask again for this?
Please search for \"PhoneProfiles\" application and enable it.
When you have Huawei device, please enable protection of PhoneProfiles in \"Advanced settings\"→\"Battery manager\"→\"Protected apps\". Without this, application will not work correctly.

When you have Xiaomi device, please set \"No restrictions\" for PhoneProfiles in \"Settings\"→\"Battery & performance\"→\"Manager apps battery usage\"→\"Choose apps\". Without this, application will not work correctly.
When you have Samsung device, please turn off \"App power saving\" for PhoneProfiles in \"Settings\"→\"Battery\"→\"App power saving\"→\"Detail\". Without this, application will not work correctly.
For each profile parameter can be set that it is used Source profile. Click here to configure the Source profile parameters.
For more informations look at \"Important info\" (question mark icon in Editor bottom toolbar).
This important info can be viewed In Editor through the question mark icon in the bottom toolbar.
unsupported network type or can\'t be change

Event will be started, if parameters of all sensors with \"Enable sensor\" parameter checked, are fulfilled. Running event will be ended, if any sensor parameter is not fulfilled. Check \"Enable sensor\" only for needed sensors for this event. Sensor name with \"Enable sensor\" checked is marked with bold text.\n\nSome sensor parameters are required. Required parameter name is marked with underline text. If any required parameter is not configured, event will not be started and parameter \"Enable sensor\" is unchecked.
Some devices do not supports colorful icons in status bar.
For notification volume = 0 configure notification tone to \"PhoneProfiles Silent\" for true silent notifications.
Notification tone \"PhoneProfiles Silent\" is not installed. Please install it from Editor menu a try again.
Your device has merged volume for call ringing and notifications. You can use \"Unlink ringer and notif. volumes\". Click here to configure it.
Your device has merged volume for call ringing and notifications. If you want unlink volumes, check this parameter.
Enable usage of parameter \"Priority\" in application settings.
Ringtone volume = 0 configures the device to silent mode. Notification volume is ignored.

Ongoing status bar notification is required for service PhoneProfilesService. With notification, PhoneProfilesService is changed to \"foreground service\". And this type of service is not killed by Android. PhoneProfilesService must permanent running.
Priority functionality: Event will not be started, if is running event with higher priority.
Bluetooth types: [CL] classic, [LE] low energy, [DU] dual.
This sensor is for start of event by time. Parameters: Start time, End time, Days of week.
This sensor is for start of event by calendar event. Parameters: Calendars, Search field (Event name, Description, …), Search string, Ignore \"All day\" events, Availability (Busy, Free, …).
This sensor is for start of event by battery level. Parameters: Lower level, Upper level, Charging, Power save mode.
This sensor is for start of event by calling contacts. Parameters: Call event (Ringing, Outgoing call started, …), Contact groups, Contacts, Contact list type (white/black list).
This sensor is for start of event by received sms from contacts. Parameters: Contact groups, Contacts, Contact list type (white/black list), Permanent run, Duration (event running duration).
This sensor is for start of event by device location. Parameters: Location, Start when outside location.
This sensor is for start of event by Wi-Fi SSID. Parameters: Connection Type (Around, Connected, …), SSID.
This sensor is for start of event by Bluetooth name. Parameters: Connection Type (Around, Connected, …), Scanned device type (Classic, Low energy, …), Bluetooth name.
This sensor is for start of event by connected mobile cells (towers). Parameters: Cells, Start when outside cells.
This sensor is for start of event by connected accessory (car dock, wired handsfree, headphones, …). Parameters: Accessories type.
This sensor is for start of event by screen on/off. Parameters: Event type (screen on, screen off, …), End when unlocked (end of event at unlock the device).

This sensor is for start of event by notification from applications. Parameters: Applications, End when removed (end of event at notification remove), Permanent run, Duration (event running duration).
This sensor is for start of event by application in foreground. Parameters: Applications.

This sensor is for start of event by device orientation. Parameters: Display (Up, down), Sides (Horizontal, side up), Distance (Near, far; used is proximity sensor), Ignore for applications (in foreground).
This sensor is for start of event by NFC tags. Parameters: NFC tags, Permanent run, Duration (event running duration).
Click this or swipe left display side to right, for opening \"Views\" side panel. In this panel you can switch between Profiles and Events views.
Click this for opening Application menu. In this menu are application Settings.
Click this for restarting events. You must restart events, for start of events, if you have manually activated profile.
Click this for opening activity log. Logged are activities about start/pause/stop events, profiles activation, start application, …
Click this for adding new profile.
Click this for deleting all profiles.
Click this for showing Important info. Please read these informations.
Click this for adding new event.
Click this for deleting all events.
Click this for opening profile preferences and you can edit these preferences.
Click this for opening profile menu with options: Activate, Duplicate and Delete profile.
Drag profile up/down with this for changing profile view order in Activator.
Click this for opening event preferences and you can edit these preferences.
Click this for opening event menu with options: Enable/Stop run, Duplicate and Delete event.
Drag event up/down with this for changing event \"Start order\".
Click this for opening Editor. In Editor you can configure profiles, events, change application settings…
Click this for opening Editor. In Editor you can configure profiles, change application settings…
Click this for saving profile preferences changes.
Click this for saving event preferences changes.
This profile will be activated if no any event is running.
This is used only for manual profile activation.
